questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST useful information for an IS auditor to review when formulating an audit plan for the organization's outsourced service provider?

discussion.content: I would have to say A as well, as the SLA would provide agreed upon perform metrics

Selected Answer: C
I will go with C
C. Criteria used to determine the benefits of projects

choices.C: Criteria used to determine the benefits of projects
choices.A: Skills and capabilities within the project management team
choices.B: Quality and accuracy of the IT project inventory

questions.question_text: Which of the following should be the MOST important consideration when prioritizing the funding for competing IT projects?

choices.A: Skill set of the response team

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST important consideration when investigating a security breach of an e-commerce application?

discussion.content: Why not B. Chain of custody?
A. The internal audit manager has a reporting line to the audit committee.

questions.question_text: Which of the following indicates that an internal audit organization is structured to support the independence and clarity of the reporting process?

choices.C: Auditors are responsible for assessing and operating a system of internal controls.
choices.A: The internal audit manager has a reporting line to the audit committee.
choices.B: The internal audit manager reports functionally to a senior management official.
choices.D: Auditors are responsible for performing operational duties or activities.

questions.question_text: Which of the following would BEST protect the confidentiality of sensitive data in transit between multiple offices?
